Condor:

that isn't my question, Sir, I as courious why the lady hates 
Galvatron now knows as Hydras"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus looks up at Condor.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Do you read history, Condor? At one time Galvatron 
was ruler of the Decepticons and I was the Autobot Supreme Commander. 
My history with Galvatron is as heated as that between Megatron and 
Optimus Prime.
